pullrequest.title: Logging Part 2: Inserting messages into a log file

content.raw:
Looking at the tests, I see the following pattern for constructing a `Descriptor`:

* Instantiate a `Descriptor` object.
* Populate a `TopicKeyMap` object.
* Call reset to populate `desc` with `topics`.

Would it be possible to simplify this pattern by offering a `Descriptor` constructor that accepts a `TopicKeyMap` object?

Also, is there any way of directly adding some entries to an existing descriptor without resetting entirely?
content.html:
Looking at the tests, I see the following pattern for constructing a Descriptor:

  • Instantiate a Descriptor object.
  • Populate a TopicKeyMap object.
  • Call reset to populate desc with topics.

Would it be possible to simplify this pattern by offering a Descriptor constructor that accepts a TopicKeyMap object?

Also, is there any way of directly adding some entries to an existing descriptor without resetting entirely?
